I'm Caitlin Casar, a data scientist `r emo::ji("floppy_disk")` interested in astrobiology `r emo::ji("alien")`. I love coding, graphic design, and hanging out with my two cats, Creme Fraiche and Neko `r emo::ji("cat")``r emo::ji("cat")`.
